string.text: Hey! I found this. I don't really need it so I guess you can have it.
Hey! Want this?
I don't really trust you but we can still help each other. You can have this.
Hey, stumbled upon this. I don't need it, and you look like you could use a help.
Trust is earned, and I'm not there yet, but here, take this. Better you have it than the Zone swallows it.
In the Zone you need every help you can get. Found this, thought it might tip the odds.
It's not all anomalies and mutants with you around. Here, a little something for the road.
This place can eat you alive. Here's a small something to keep you one step ahead.
I appreciate the company. Found this lying around, thought you might make better use of it.
It's not all bad traveling with you. Here, take this. Consider it a rare gesture of kindness.
I've got your back, and I figured you could use this. Don't say I never did anything for you.
You're not half bad to have around. Here, a little gift to show my appreciation.
We make a decent team. Found this, thought it might be useful for you.
In this godforsaken place, allies are rare. Consider this a gesture of trust, Stalker.
We're starting to click, aren't we? Here, a little something for the road.
Trust like this is hard to come by. Here's a gift, a symbol of our unbroken bond.
I'm glad we're on the same side. Found this and thought of you.
You're one of the few I can trust out here. Here's a little something for you, my friend.
You're not just a partner; you're a true friend. Take this as a thank you for being there.
The trials of the Zone are easier with you around. This is for you, my trusted companion.

Hey, just reminding you about the money I gave you. No rush, but you know, don't forget about it.
Listen, I hate to bring it up again, but that money you owe me? Any chance you could get it back to me soon?
Hey, I've been patient, but this money situation is getting a bit tense. I could really use it back. Can you make it happen?
Alright, we've talked about this before, and it's starting to wear on our friendship. I need that money back. Now.
Look, I've had enough of waiting. You owe me that money, and I'm getting pissed off about it. Sort it out, ok? Ok.
Time's ticking, and I'm still waiting for that money. Seriously, this is getting old. Pay up!
You're really pushing it now. I've been more than patient, but my patience is running out. I need that money back, and I need it now!
Jesus man, why the fuck you still have my money?! God you are so annoying.
This is ridiculous. You're seriously testing our friendship here. Pay back what you owe, or things are going to get ugly between us.
I can't believe it's come to this. You are ridiculous, give me my money back!
Yeah I'm out, this is really not working out. You're on your own. stalker.
I don't know if this situation is working, you know? I'm considering leaving the squad.
Our path's diverging. Unless things change, I might have to walk it alone. Just a heads-up.
Not sure if sticking around is the smart move. Zone's tough, and I don't know if you got what it takes.
The Zone's unpredictable, and so is our situation. Thinking about going solo for a bit.
Thinking of ditching the group. Things ain't working.
